Nemesis Air
  • The Manager
  • View page source

The ManagerÔÉÅ

AbstractÔÉÅ

Nemesis Air follows a components-based architecture. Every part of the project run as a Component object. A component is initialized, starts and then stops. These states changed are managed by the Manager object.

Add new components and profilesÔÉÅ

To add new components and profiles, please see this guide (coming soon).
